title: Star of ‘Opening Weekend’ Buried Himself Training with Van Der Poel All Winter: ‘I Never Trained This Hard’
content:
Kuurne-Brussel-Kuurne winner Jasper Philipsen says he’s stronger than before thanks to his Alpecin-Deceuninck teammate Van der Poel.

Read the full article at Star of ‘Opening Weekend’ Buried Himself Training with Van Der Poel All Winter: ‘I Never Trained This Hard’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
